title: really i need support from a rioter
body: hi, i had no support at all in the riot support web, all the request are closet and redirect to an already closed request and the only one that do that is Achungo, he respond all my request closing it, whitout send me a mail to let me know that the request is closed, please i really need help.

replies.body:
Hey there!

Sorry that you aren't getting the help you need, but I'm glad to see you at least reaching out! Well I might not be able to help you out exactly... but I can try and possibly explain what went wrong. Why don't you explain the reasoning for a support ticket?

From the sounds of it and what you have stated in this thread, yes. If all you are doing is posting support tickets that are asking for him to be reported then there is no validity to your actual request at hand since you haven't made a support ticket with any sort of merit. You need to actually have a problem in the game itself or concern that isn't just harassing a Riot employee for them to respond to you. I hope this helps you out.

Alright so a few things that could help you out:

1) Riot is more than likely not ignoring your concerns, but instead just keeping logs and moving on as it seems since the stuff you are reporting isn't... something they can instantly respond to. They have to investigate and the stuff that they are investigating are private since it effects the offenders, not you.

2) Don't be offended if they don't keep you in the loop. They appreciate you reporting this stuff to them, but as I said before... the end result is private to those who are being reported.
